item.title: FullWidth Contact Form
item.dc:creator: aroush
item.content:encoded:
[text* your-name /100 class:form-control]
[email* your-email /100 class:form-control]
[text your-subject /100 class:form-control]
[textarea* your-message x10/5000 class:form-control]
[submit class:btn class:btn-primary class:btn-lg "Send Message"]
[your-subject] [your-name] <[your-email]> From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Porto - Responsive HTML5 Template (http://spyropress.com/porto) info@spyropress.com [your-subject] [your-name] <[your-email]> Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Porto - Responsive HTML5 Template (http://spyropress.com/porto) [your-email] Your message was sent successfully. item.title: Contact Advanced
item.dc:creator: aroush
item.content:encoded:
[text* your-name /100 class:form-control]
[email* your-email /100 class:form-control]
[select* your-subject class:form-control "Option 1" "Option 2" "Option 3" "Option 4"]
[checkbox checkboxs use_label_element "1" "2" "3" "4" "5"]
[radio radios use_label_element "1" "2" "3" "4" "5"]
[file attachment]
[textarea* your-message x10/5000 class:form-control]
[captchac captcha bg:#F2F2F2 size:l]
[captchar captcha class:form-control placeholder "Please enter the verification code."]
[submit class:btn class:btn-primary class:btn-lg class:pull-right "Send Message"]
[your-subject] [your-name] <[your-email]> From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Porto (http://spyropress.com/porto) no-reply@spyropress.com [your-subject] [your-name] <[your-email]> Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Porto (http://spyropress.com/porto) [your-email] Your message was sent successfully.
